name: Jumper (Kegco Inc.)
description:
BUILD: This is for Android and PC and soon on IOS. The android version will have all the most latest updates and features, so the android build is the much better version.

GAME PLAY: You are a little robot that has to escape the world that is being eaten by darkness. You must run through challenging obstacle courses.

Update: 01/102016

better graphics, preformance, more levels, icon, how to play instructions, Superjump, enemys, music.

CONTROLS: PC- (a=left) (d=right) (space bar=jump) (esc= pause menu)

ANDROID: (Joystick = movement) (button=Jump)

OTHER INFO: This is my first game and is still in development there are only a few levels but there will be more added soon. I hope you leave feed back and enjoy.

Support: if you liked my game then and you want to see more you can go check out my friends channel where they do live commentary of my game and more, just go to https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDjymlOraN__wdZua...
